CMS_PageTemplate.PageTemplateDescription: Contains a page title, new object button, selector (UniSelector) and a list of objects (UniGrid). The selector saves the value of the selected object into the UI context. You can access the selected value in other web parts on the template through macros: {%UIContext.<Selector context name>% }
